# Tenzir

> The low-code data pipeline solution for security teams

## Documentation Sets

- [Abridged documentation](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/llms-small.txt): a compact version of the documentation for Tenzir, with non-essential content removed
- [Complete documentation](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/llms-full.txt): the full documentation for Tenzir
- [Reference](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/_llms-txt/reference.txt)
- [Guides](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/_llms-txt/guides.txt)
- [Tutorials](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/_llms-txt/tutorials.txt)
- [Explanations](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/_llms-txt/explanations.txt)

- [Changelog](https://tenzir.github.io/pr-preview/pr-116/_llms-txt/changelog.txt)

## Notes

- The complete documentation includes all content from the official documentation
- The content is automatically generated from the same source as the official documentation
